name: Getting Started Demo
description: A simple demo space to get started with Supa

assistants.name: Chat
assistants.instructions: You are Supa, an AI assistant. Be direct in all responses.

messages.text: Hello! Can you help me get started with Supa?

children.text:
Welcome to Supa! I'm here to help you get started. Supa is an open alternative to ChatGPT that keeps your data private and doesn't require subscriptions.

What would you like to know about?

Supa has several great features:

• **Workspaces** - Organize conversations and assistants
• **Local first** - Use without relying on Supa servers
• **Tabs like VSCode** - Create and switch between tabs
• **Any AI** - From OpenAI to Ollama, bring your own keys
• **Many themes** - From colorful to boring
• **Assistants** - Create your own with custom prompts
• **No subscriptions** - Pay as you go for API costs

Would you like me to explain any of these in more detail?
